review: Works well. arrived as described . No issues
author: Raffi

review: Works well.  Occasionally have to reconnect to the router but I think that's due to my router, not the chromecast.
author: Andy H

review: Works great and easy to get up and running.  Would make the purchase again.
author: RT

review: Can't use it with Prime so I returned it. The product functions fine though. Fire stick is awesome, I highly recommend it over chromecast.
author: BMS

review: works as advertised streams anything from your laptop right to your tv
author: Anthony J. Sommer

review: Great product fire Hulu,  Netflix,  and YouTube.  Occasional loss of connection but I assume thats related to my Internet connection and not the device.  Some apps don't cast properly (ABC) but must of what is wanted can be found on Hulu.  This is a great alternative to expensive cable or satellite.  I look forward to more apps and improvements to overall quality of current apps
author: Kyle M Golden
